api_list.api_description: Predicts the gender of multiple names using the Genderize API, with optional localization by country.

required_parameters.name: names
required_parameters.description: The names to predict genders for, maximum 10 names.

optional_parameters.name: country_id
optional_parameters.description: Country code for localization following ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

api_list.api_description: Shortens a given URL using the is.gd service.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL you want to shorten.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format of the response ('web', 'simple', 'xml', 'json'). Default is 'simple'.

optional_parameters.name: shorturl
optional_parameters.description: Custom shortened URL you would like to use. (5 to 30 characters)

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Used only with format 'json' to specify a callback function.

optional_parameters.name: logstats
optional_parameters.description: If 1, enables logging of detailed statistics.

query: I have a list of names: [Jane, Dylan, Sam] and I want to find out the predicted genders as per Canadian data. Additionally, can you provide me with a short link for the webpage that allows new users to sign up?
